official_title: Project RESIST: Evaluating the Effects of Anti-smoking Inoculation Messages Among Young Adult Sexual Minority Women
inclusion_criteria:
* Ages 18-30
* Woman
* Identifies as a sexual minority (any sexual orientation other than heterosexual)
* Lives in the United States
* Able to take surveys in English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 30 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Under 18 or older than 30
* Men
* Heterosexual
* Lives outside the United States
* Unable to take the survey in English
